name: Kevin Ramirez
persona: Kevin is a 20-year-old Business Administration major who has struggled academically, currently holding a CGPA of 1.55. He finds it challenging to stay organized and motivated, often putting off assignments and lacking self-discipline. While Kevin doesn't feel overly anxious during exams, his overall low motivation and perseverance have affected his grades. He recognizes the need to improve his study habits and is considering seeking academic support to get back on track.
